Star Trek: Lower Decks

(a Titles & Air Dates Guide)

Last updated: Sat, 10 Oct 2020 -1:00
Misadventures of the support crew serving on one of Starfleet's least important ships.
Show Details:
Start date: Aug 2020
End date: ___ ____
Status: current show
Network(s): CBS All Access (US)
Run time: 30 min
Episodes: 10+ eps
Genre(s): Animated, Comedy, Science Fiction
Credits:
  • Tawny Newsome as the voice of Ensign Beckett Mariner
  • Jack Quaid as the voice of Ensign Brad Boimler
  • Noël Wells as the voice of Ensign D'Vana Tendi
  • Eugene Cordero as the voice of Ensign Rutherford
  • Dawnn Lewis as the voice of Captain Carol Freeman
  • Jerry O'Connell as the voice of Commander Jack Ransom
  • Fred Tatasciore as the voice of Lieutenant Shaxs
  • Gillian Vigman as the voice of Dr. T'Ana
